citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The itinerary submitted by the facility did not include the name, identification number or identifying characteristics,
species, sex, or age of each animal. Additionally, the itinerary did not include the addresses for some of the events.
Incomplete information in an itinerary prevents oversight of the animals being transported in commerce. All itineraries
must include the above information as well as the name of the person who intends to exhibit the animals and must be
submitted at least 48 hours before the planned event. Correct by October 5, 2024.

A piece of metal wire was observed projecting into an enclosure housing three sheep. Sharp points can injure animals
and negatively impact welfare. Outdoor housing facilities shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from
injury. Corrected at the time of the inspection. Correct by September 29, 2024.
This inspection was conducted at the Bristol Mum Festival located at 70 Memorial Boulevard in Bristol, Connecticut.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(c)(1) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The itinerary submitted by the facility did not include the name, identification number or identifying characteristics, 
species, sex, or age of each animal. Additionally, the itinerary did not include the addresses for some of the events. 
Incomplete information in an itinerary prevents oversight of the animals being transported in commerce. All itineraries 
must include the above information as well as the name of the person who intends to exhibit the animals and must be 
submitted at least 48 hours before the planned event. Correct by October 5, 2024. 
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
A piece of metal wire was observed projecting into an enclosure housing three sheep. Sharp points can injure animals 
and negatively impact welfare. Outdoor housing facilities shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from 
injury. Corrected at the time of the inspection. Correct by September 29, 2024. 
 
This inspection was conducted at the Bristol Mum Festival located at 70 Memorial Boulevard in Bristol, Connecticut. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
